boat.full_description: Swallow was bought to replace an earlier wooden Heron which was sadly suffering from terminal rot. She was sailed out of Coquet Yacht Club in Northumberland, and in 2019 won the Harris Trophy for overall winner of the North East OGA Championships competing against some boats twice her size. She has recently been moved south and currently sails out of Priory SC near Bedford. She took part in the OGA 60th Anniversary 2023, in Suffolk.
boat.name: Lollipop
boat.short_description: Swallow is a Heron Class dinghy with a fibreglass hull, purchased on EBay
